Html:
In windows forms application I can show error bars for an existing data series based on standard deviation values calculated from that data series. This can be done using the chart control that comes with VS 2010. However, it seems there is no equivalent feature in the Chart class of the WPF Toolkit.  It seems like one has to create a customised data series for the error bar to work in WPF. Any help on how to create a customised data series for error bar would be appreciated.

 

Thanks,

PK
